name: Bushido Bunny
description:
Bushido Bunny is a Beat Em' Up inspired from titles like Castle Crashers
Join my Discord https://discord.gg/SZdNeC8at4
& Join me on Twitch: http://twitch.tv/banish4cost

MOVE : [ARROW KEYS]
ATTACK: [A]
SPECIAL: [S]
JUMP: [SPACE]
PAUSE: [ESC]
RESTART LEVEL: [R]
RESPAWN: [1]

Short project for practice in game-dev

This was my first real test at programming, so it was a great learning experience for do's and dont's. I figured I'd upload it, if anyone wanted to try it out.
It can be glitchy, due to my spaghetti code.
